title: DLP Tactical Rigid Universal Pistol Magazine Pouch for Glock Beretta 1911 S&W MOLLE Version 2.0
features: Compatible with most pistol magazines from single stack .22 to double stack .45 and from all makes (Beretta, Glock, 1911, S&W, H&K, etc.)
Can be worn on belt or attached directly to MOLLE / PALS webbing, can also be doublestacked with DLP Tactical rifle Speedmags
Positive magazine retention without flaps or straps, can even be worn upside down
Package contains 1 (ONE) SpeedMag, Proudly made by DLP Tactical
description: The DLP Tactical Rigid Universal Pistol Magazine Pouch accommodates most semiautomatic pistol magazines regardless of caliber, from pencil thin single stack .22 through to the widest body double stack .45 magazines. It reduces reloading cycle time for the operator and can be mounted in the up or down direction. The system eliminates the need for traditional top closures, flaps, hooks, covers, or lids. The enhanced urethane tension straps are removable to meet the user's preference for removal tension. Can be worn on any pistol belt or attached directly to MOLLE webbing, can be also be attached to DLP Tactical rifle SpeedMags in "double-stack" configuration for additional mounting options. (DLP Tactical rifle SpeedMags sold separately). DLP Tactical - Separating The Operators From The Amateurs
